import React from 'react' import { userLogin } from '../reducers/userReducer' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { TextField, Typography, Container, Button } from '@material-ui/core' const LoginForm = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const handleLogin = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const login = { username: e.target.username.value, password: e.target.password.value } dispatch(userLogin(login)) e.target.username.value = '' e.target.password.value = '' } const loginStyle = { display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', maxWidth: '250px' } return( Login to the application {/*

Login to the application TEST

*/}
{/* */}
) } export default LoginForm
